member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.PDFFile
member.summary: Represents an existing PDF file.

The resolution the page will be rendered at.

member.summary: Renders all the pages of the PDF file to a multi page TIFF image.

member.param: The resolution the pages will be rendered at.

member.summary: Creates a PdfFile object from the given pdf file.

the user password used to decrypt the PDF file.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.PDFFile.PageCount
member.summary: Gets the number of pages in the PDF file.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.PDFFile.SerialNumber
member.summary: Sets the serial number and unlocks the component.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.PDFFile.SubstituteFonts
member.summary: Specifies a collection of fonts to be used when the corresponding font is not embedded in the PDF file.
member.remarks: This collection is searched before searching the local machine for the font. The key is the PDF font name, the value is the path to the corresponding TTF file to be used for rendering.

member.name: E:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.PDFFile.AfterPrintPage
member.summary: Fired after a PDF page is printed.
member.remarks: You can use this event to print content, such as stamps, on the page on the PDF content.

member.name: E:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.PDFFile.BeforePrintPage
member.summary: Fired before a PDF page is printed.
member.remarks: You can use this event to print content, such as watermarks, on the page under the PDF content.

member.name: E:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.PDFFile.PageRenderingError
member.summary: Gets or sets the event being fired when a page rendering error has occured.

member.name: E:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.PDFFile.PrintProgress
member.summary: Fired after a PDF page is printed, to notify about the progress of the print operation.
member.remarks: You can use this event to dispaly a progress bar that indicates the progress of the print operation.

member.name: E:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.PDFFile.QueryPageSettings
member.summary: Fired before a PDF page is printed for setting page properties.
member.remarks: You can use this event to change the page printing properties, such as paper size and paper source.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.Exceptions.PDFPageRenderingError
member.summary: Specifies the possible errors that can appear during the rendering of a PDF page.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.Exceptions.PDFPageRenderingError.CmykJpeg
member.summary: CMYK JPEG image is rendered as negative.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.Exceptions.PDFPageRenderingError.Jpeg2000
member.summary: JPEG2000 image is not rendered.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.Exceptions.PDFPageRenderingError.JBig2
member.summary: JBIG2 image is not rendered.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.Exceptions.PDFPageRenderingError.ContentStreamError
member.summary: Content stream cannot be processed.

member.summary: Initializes a new InvalidPageException object.
member.param: The message with details about the error in page content.
